Talents.Name: Mon3tr
Talents.Description: Can use and heal Mon3tr, and Mon3tr has a 25 second redeployment time. <Operator Name> will prioritize healing herself and Mon3tr; If Mon3tr is not within <Operator Name>'s Attack Range, Mon3tr's DEF is reduced to 0

Talents.Name: Non-Damaging Restructuring
Talents.Description: When Mon3tr is defeated (excluding retreat), all enemies in the surrounding 8 tiles are Stunned for 3 seconds and receive 1200 True damage
